title: Gateway National Recreation Area: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Gateway offers teachers several professional development opportunities in Jamaica Bay. Education workshops at Gateway are designed to create a collaborative community between teachers and scientists that will allow teachers to involve their students with researchers doing actual scientific work in the park. All Teacher Workshops       Teacher Workshops Learn More     Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Spend a summer among the salt marshes and beaches of Gateway and help develop educational programs for the National Park Service!  All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers       Teacher Ranger Teacher Learn More
